title: Netflix’s Hunchback of Notre-Dame Movie Casts Acclaimed Actor as Quasimodo
creator: Ryan Louis Mantilla
description: Netflix has greenlit a movie retelling of Quasimodo, set to reimagine the life of the hunchbacked man said to have inspired Victor Hugo’s 1831 cult gothic novel The Hunchback of Notre-Dame.
